alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 5:01AM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. The snow rates will be likely the highest between 5 AM and 7 AM near the Wisconsin River. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Richland, Crawford and Grant Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
